wikipedia_page.main:
Hugh Edgar is an English architect who worked on several archival projects in the United Kingdom and as a consultant around the world. He completed the design  for the National Museum of Antiquities for Scotland.  He was the RIBA representative to the British Standard Committee about  BS 5454:2000 "Recommendations for storage and exhibition of archival documents."  He was also commissioned by the royal family of Jordan.
Edgar achieved renown as one of the participants in the television series The Edwardian Country House, in which he portrayed the butler.

response: * Hugh Edgar, a butler in the The Edwardian Country House, 2002 British historical recreation TV series

Interest and conflict is provided by the 15 servants, portrayed by individuals from several paths of life. Chief among these was Hugh Edgar, an architect from Surrey, who was cast in the role of the butler.
